name: An Infinite Chapbook of Poetry for Many Voices to Scream in the Woods
name_original: An Infinite Chapbook of Poetry for Many Voices to Scream in the Woods
description:
Uh oh, SCREAMING HOUR is almost here and your cicada friends don't know what to yell! Talk to them to learn their interests, then investigate the many strange objects and creatures that inhabit your new world, gathering your favorite words as you go. Take them back to your friends and start SCREAMING HOUR to turn your words into a poem. Then click play and join in the joyous cacophony!

How To Play

Credits

Collectively designed and made by Carrie (audio production, design, and music), Emma (writing, word curation, photography), Jake (programming), and Rose (pixel art). Made for the Brood X Jam.

Also featuring the voices of:

  • Nicky Case
  • Caitlin (@celloandbehold)
  • Jeff Conner
  • Tamara Grasty
  • Josh (The Fool) Himmelfarb
  • Laura
  • Ericka Luckert
  • Jason McCormick
  • Max Reinhold
  • riskystandard
  • Joey Rose Rysen
  • Adina Shanholtz
  • siberianpine
  • Buffy Silverman
  • treerabbit

Cicada sounds are from public domain recordings of Brood X by georgeindc and Yann Seznec.
